alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:22PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Teller and west central El Paso Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 322 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Victor, or 18 miles southwest of Colorado Springs, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Manitou Springs, Cripple Creek, Victor and Pikes Peak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
